Package mp3player.desktopaudio

This package provides an abstraction layer for audio playback.

    MediaFile
    A MediaFile represents a media, usually sound, file either stored locally or accessible on some server.
    Player
    Player is the main interface to play back or obtain information about a MediaFile or MediaStream.

    AudioDataFormat contains information about the format of decoded audio data.
    AudioEngine
    AudioEngine represents a backend interface for playing audio.

    MediaFormat stores the properties of a media.
    MediaInfo
    MediaInfo provides general information about a media format independent of the media type.
    MediaStream
    The MediaStream interface represents a stream of audio bytes of which the format is known.

Package mp3player.desktopaudio Description

This package provides an abstraction layer for audio playback.

The main interface and entry point is AudioEngine which can be used to obtain information about the audio system as well as create Players. Player is the main interface for playing back audio. It can pull the audio data either from a MediaFile or a MediaStream.

No audio library (like javax.sound.sampled) is referenced by any of the classes or interfaces.

Author:
Philipp Holl
